meanings.definition: The dropping or falling of an organ or part, especially the eyelid.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed her with ptoses after noticing her drooping eyelid.
meanings.sent2: She underwent surgery to correct the ptoses in her eyelid.
meanings.sent3: The ptoses in her eyelid made her look like she was winking all the time.
meanings.sent4: Her eyelid's ptoses cast a shadow over her vision, obscuring her view.
meanings.sent5: The ptoses in her eyelid made her constantly feel like she was half asleep.

meanings.definition: A condition in which an organ or part has dropped or fallen.
meanings.sent1: The patient's ptoses required immediate medical attention to prevent further complications.
meanings.sent2: The ptoses in his abdomen caused discomfort and pain.
meanings.sent3: His ptoses were so severe that his pants kept slipping down.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the ptoses in his chest made it hard for him to breathe.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained that the ptoses in his body were causing his symptoms.
